languages.text: Аугментации Паскаля отделены, но не извлечены из тела. В местах их сочленения с органическими тканями скопился гной и сукровица, на которых пируют хищные многоножки.

traits.locale_text: Истинная плоть Паскаля отделена, но не извлечена из тела. В местах ее сочленения с органическими тканями сочится гной и сукровица, на которых пируют хищные многоножки.

languages.text: Pasqal's augmetics were separated but not extracted from his body. The places where they connect to the organic tissue teem with predatory millipedes feasting on the coagulating blood and accumulated pus.
languages.original_text: Аугментации Паскаля отделены, но не извлечены из тела. В местах их сочленения с органическими тканями скопился гной и сукровица, на которых пируют хищные многоножки.

traits.locale_text: Pasqual's augmentations were separated but not extracted from the body. The places where they connect to the organic tissue are teeming with predatory millipedes that feast on the coagulating blood and accumulated pus.

Pasqual's True Flesh was separated but not extracted from the body. The places where it connects to the organic tissue are teeming with predatory millipedes that feast on the coagulating blood and oozing pus.

Pasqual's augmetics were separated but not extracted from the body. The places where they connect to the organic tissue are teeming with predatory millipedes that feast on the coagulating blood and accumulated pus.

Pasqual's augmetics were separated but not extracted from the body. The places where they connect to the organic tissue are teeming with predatory millipedes that feast on the coagulating blood and accumulated pus.

Pasqal's augmetics were separated but not extracted from his body. The places where they connect to the organic tissue teem with predatory millipedes feasting on the coagulating blood and accumulated pus.

Pasqal's augmetics were separated but not extracted from his body. The places where they connect to the organic tissue teem with predatory millipedes feasting on the coagulating blood and accumulated pus.

languages.text: Les augmétiques de Pasqal ont été débranchés, sans qu'on daigne les retirer de son corps. Les zones de contact avec les tissus organiques sont recouvertes de petits mille-pattes charognards qui se repaissent du pus et du sang coagulé qui s'y accumulent.
languages.original_text: Pasqal's augmetics were separated but not extracted from his body. The places where they connect to the organic tissue teem with predatory millipedes feasting on the coagulating blood and accumulated pus.

traits.locale_text: Les augmétiques de Pasqal ont été débranchés, sans qu'on daigne les retirer de son corps. Les zones de contact avec les tissus organiques sont recouvertes de petits mille-pattes charognards qui se repaissent du pus et du sang coagulé qui s'y accumulent.

languages.text: 帕斯卡身上的植入物已经被分离出来，但却并没有从身体上扯下来。这些植入物与有机组织链接的地方到处爬满了肉食性的千足虫，以凝固的血液与积聚的脓液为食。
languages.original_text: Pasqal's augmetics were separated but not extracted from his body. The places where they connect to the organic tissue teem with predatory millipedes feasting on the coagulating blood and accumulated pus.

traits.locale_text: 帕斯卡身上的植入物已经被分离出来，但却并没有从身体上扯下来。这些植入物与有机组织链接的地方到处爬满了肉食性的千足虫，以凝固的血液与积聚的脓液为食。

languages.text: パスカルのオーグメティックは切り離されたが、体内から取り出されてはいない。有機組織とつながっている個所には、凝固した血液と蓄積した膿を主食とする捕食性のヤスデがうようよしている。
languages.original_text: Pasqal's augmetics were separated but not extracted from his body. The places where they connect to the organic tissue teem with predatory millipedes feasting on the coagulating blood and accumulated pus.

traits.locale_text: パスカルのオーグメティックは切り離されたが、体内から取り出されてはいない。有機組織とつながっている個所には、凝固した血液と蓄積した膿を主食とする捕食性のヤスデがうようよしている。

languages.text: Pasqals Augmentationen wurden vom Körper abgetrennt, aber nicht entnommen. An den Stellen, wo sie sich mit dem organischem Gewebe verbinden, wimmeln sich räuberische Tausendfüßer, die sich vom geronnenen Blut und Eiter ernähren.
languages.original_text: Pasqal's augmetics were separated but not extracted from his body. The places where they connect to the organic tissue teem with predatory millipedes feasting on the coagulating blood and accumulated pus.

traits.locale_text: Pasquals Augmentationen wurden vom Körper abgetrennt, aber nicht entnommen. An den Stellen, wo sie sich mit dem organischem Gewebe verbinden, wimmeln sich räuberische Tausendfüßer, die sich vom geronnenen Blut und Eiter ernähren.

languages.text: Los implantes auméticos de Pasqal se han separado de su cuerpo, pero no los han extirpado del todo. Los puntos de ensamblaje con su tejido orgánico están infestados de voraces milpiés que se ceban con la sangre coagulada y la acumulación de pus.
languages.original_text: Pasqal's augmetics were separated but not extracted from his body. The places where they connect to the organic tissue teem with predatory millipedes feasting on the coagulating blood and accumulated pus.

traits.locale_text: Los implantes auméticos de Pasqal se han separado de su cuerpo, pero no los han extirpado del todo. Los puntos de ensamblaje con su tejido orgánico están infestados de voraces milpiés que devoran la sangre coagulada y la acumulación de pus.

languages.text: Pasqal'ın ogmetikleri vücudundan ayrılmış ama yerinden çıkarılmamış. Ogmetiklerin organik dokularla birleşim noktalarında, pıhtılaşan kanı ve biriken irini tüketen fırsatçı kırkayaklar geziyor.
languages.original_text: Pasqal's augmetics were separated but not extracted from his body. The places where they connect to the organic tissue teem with predatory millipedes feasting on the coagulating blood and accumulated pus.

traits.locale_text: Pasqal'ın ogmetikleri vücudundan ayrılmış ama yerinden çıkarılmamış. Ogmetiklerin organik dokularla birleşim noktalarında, pıhtılaşan kanı ve biriken irini tüketen fırsatçı kırkayaklar geziyor.
